name: Pet in TV: With My Dear Dog
overview: A pet (or companion animal) is a household animal kept for a person's enjoyment, as opposed to livestock, laboratory animals, working animals and sport animals which are kept for economic reasons. The most popular pets are noted for their attractive appearances and their loyal or playful personalities. Their pedigree may also be a factor. A digital pet (also known as a virtual pet or artificial pet is a type of artificial human companion. They are usually kept for companionship or enjoyment. People may keep a digital pet in lieu of a real pet. Pet in TV with my dear dog is a new type of dog simulation software. In the game the player is the owner of a dog, at the beginning of the game the player can choose the style of the house in which he and his dog will live, the game features 3 different styles of houses (modern, classic and japanese style). After that he got to choose the breed of the dog (he can also check here the bloodline of the pet), and the sex. When the dog is choose he take it to his house and there he can raise it. During the game the player can buy new dogs, but food, water, items, etc. The player can also check the pet internet to know the news and he can also go to other places of the town like the hospital, take the dog to a contest, etc. The dogs can receive visits of other dogs, the player can take pictures of the dog in some times of the game and those pictures can be watched in the dog album.
